dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.resource.res.log.prot.ProtectionGroup
dataStructure.description:
This object class represents the information about a trail protection in a Managed Element.

This entity is optional

This entity is extendable

This entity generates Object Creation notifications

This entity generates Object Deletion notifications

This entity generates Object Discovery notifications

This entity generates Attribute Value Change notifications.
dataStructure.label: ProtectionGroup

child.name: type
child.description:
This attribute identifies the type of the Protection Group.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is invariant

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: type

child.name: ituArcStateAndStatusList
child.description:
See supporting document SD1-8_encodingX731M3100.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: ituArcStateAndStatusList

child.name: layerRate
child.description:
This attribute identifies the line rate of the TPs of the Protection Group.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is invariant

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: layerRate

child.name: parameterList
child.description:
This attribute identifies any protection group specific parameters. Non-applicable parameters and parameters for which the value is unknown to the target OS may be left out. See attached SD1-29_PGPParameters supporting document for values and descriptions.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is invariant

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: parameterList

child.name: apsProtocolType
child.description:
This attribute defines the APS protocol on which the switching function is based on. Possible values: - "G.783" in case of K1/K2 based APS - "Legacy" in case of proprietary APS protocol, as for radio equipment. No default value

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is invariant

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC disabled
child.label: apsProtocolType

child.name: reversionMode
child.description:
This attribute identifies whether the switch is revertive or not. The default value depends on the protection group implementation

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: reversionMode

child.name: protectionSchemeState
child.description:
This attribute identifies the state in which the protection scheme is in. FORCED_OR_LOCKED_OUT indicates that the entire group is locked; partial locking is indicated by AUTOMATIC. Individual locks can be reported through transmission parameters on the appropriate TPs.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: protectionSchemeState

child.name: asapRef
child.description:
This attribute indicates the assignment of an Alarm Severity Assignement Profile (ASAP) to the Protection Group.

This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association PGHasASAP

This association end is passed by value

This association end is optional

This association end is AVC enabled
child.label: asapRef

child.name: protectionRelatedTps
child.description:
This attribute contains the list of PTPs that belong in the Protection Group. The list of PTPs is partially ordered. The protecting PTP always trails its worker PTPs. The East PTPs are always contiguous in the list, as well as West PTPs. At least 2 values.

This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association PGHasRelatedTP

This association end is invariant

This association end is passed by id

This association end is optional

This association end is AVC disabled
child.label: protectionRelatedTps
